amendment.description: To appropriate an additional $1,829,400,000 to construct double-layered fencing and vehicle barriers along the southwest border and to offset such increase by reducing all other discretionary amounts on a prorata basis.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4659 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 29 - 71. Record Vote Number: 200.

action.text: Amendment SA 4659 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S7478, S7478-7483, S7484-7485, S7487; text as modified: CR S7485) To appropriate an additional $1,829,400,000 to construct double-layered fencing and vehicle barriers along the southwest border and to offset such increase by reducing all other discretionary amounts on a prorata basis.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4659 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 29 - 71. Record Vote Number: 200.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4659 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 29 - 71. Record Vote Number: 200.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4659 proposed by Senator Sessions.
